every; all
1996, Universal Declaration of Human Rights, Vai translation, article 3:
ꗞ ꔰ ꕚ ꖷ ꕉ ꔱꕩ ꗃꗡ ꕞ, ꗞ ꔰ ꔇꔀ ꕉ ꗃ ꗛꖺ ꗘꘋꕧ ꗏ ꕉꖷ ꗞ ꔰ ꖴꘋ ꕃꕞ ꗏꖺꕎ ꕉ ꕩꕌ ꕎꕬ ꖴꕮ ꗱꗡ.mɔ gbi ta mu a fiya ɓɔɛ la, mɔ gbi ɓee a ɓɔ kɔɔ dʒɔŋdʒa lɔ amu mɔ gbi kuŋ kila lɔɔwa a yaha waŋga kuma fɛɛ.Everyone has the right to life, liberty and the security of person.
